title: You all cry about how reksai is too easy to avoid..
body:
Hmm its called counterplay? 400 base damage +1.2 AD ratio +40% missing health..

Hm..last time i check this type of damage should be easy to avoid...

Excuse me that you need to play with a bit skill to hit your ultis..I mean check nightblue3 videos this guy play first time REKSAI (the uptade one) and he only miss one ulti..he was thinking that it was a connect ability not a skillshot but after he first lost one he realize it..

But you in silver you cant even hit morgana and thresh Q so i can understand why you feel like reksai ulti is to easy to avoid...

and NB played that on PBE meaning most of his opponents were not even close to his skill level.

Point and click ability that can miss by dodging it yeah (so i call it skillshot even if not the right term that not the subject here) it need some skills to hit it where the wrong with that?

Ahh now is about skill lvl? is nto about how easy is to dodge? so if the enemy is good he can dodge it..that what you say...so that mean that riot create a skill that a skilled player can hit it and equal skilled player can dodge it...hmmm that sound to me like a good design of champion tht have a skill level and is not braindead..

Yeah i dont see any problem here exepct bronzies try to justify that they are so bad they cant hit reksai ultimate and they jsut want riot to make it undogable
